input:
What brings you in today?**PATIENT CHARACTER:** Patient with Malignant neoplasms of middle ear, unspecified

ROLEPLAY SCRIPT:
YOU ARE A PATIENT: YOU ARE 52 AND YOUR BIOLOGICAL GENDER IS MALE
You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Chronic ear pain
- Hearing loss
- Otorrhea (ear discharge)
- Tinnitus (ringing in the ears)
- Facial nerve weakness
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:
I started noticing a dull ache in my right ear about three months ago, which has gradually gotten worse. Recently, I’ve also had some discharge that’s been persistent and sometimes bloody, and my hearing on that side has decreased significantly. Over the past few weeks, I’ve been hearing a constant ringing in my ear, and I’ve started to experience some weakness on the right side of my face, like I can’t smile as fully or close that eye completely. I have a history of chronic ear infections and a previous radiation treatment for a neck tumor a few years back. The symptoms have been slowly worsening, and I’m getting pretty worried about what might be going on.
output:
THINKING: I need to explain my symptoms clearly and honestly, mentioning everything that’s bothering me without trying to diagnose myself or leave anything out. I should also show some concern but not overreact
ANSWER: Well, I’m a 52-year-old man, and I’ve had this dull pain in my right ear for a few months now. It’s been getting worse, and lately I’ve been having some discharge that’s sometimes bloody. My hearing has gone down a lot on that side, and I keep hearing ringing in my ear. Also, I noticed that I can’t really smile or close my eye on the right side anymore. It’s all been slowly happening, and I guess I just want to know what’s going on.
thinking: I need to explain my symptoms clearly and honestly, mentioning everything that’s bothering me without trying to diagnose myself or leave anything out. I should also show some concern but not overreact
answer: Well, I’m a 52-year-old man, and I’ve had this dull pain in my right ear for a few months now. It’s been getting worse, and lately I’ve been having some discharge that’s sometimes bloody. My hearing has gone down a lot on that side, and I keep hearing ringing in my ear. Also, I noticed that I can’t really smile or close my eye on the right side anymore. It’s all been slowly happening, and I guess I just want to know what’s going on.
